website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a cheap teleprompter that's durable and delivers decent image quality, this is the best for the money.
pros: Low-cost, with a beam splitter glass and excellent case
Takes all but the biggest tablets
cons: Black cloth hood can obscure lens

customer_reviews.title: Light and compact yet amazing build quality and professional equipment
customer_reviews.text: Super pleased with this teleprompter Easy to setup and easy to mount everything together. Doing some test footage and no ghosting or issues. The glass is quality and the best part is when not using it the whole unit folds super slim and comes with a nice compact carry case, ideal for taking to various locations.
customer_reviews.author: @Richard_WestranTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Crucial weakness!
customer_reviews.text: NOT ready-to-use from the box. The most basic 9.7" Retina iPad DOES NOT FIT! And by a mere 1/4th of an inch!!? Argh! The shame, the shame! This is just a terrible oversight. I will not return it but have to replace some parts with hand-made ones, a huge hassle. Very unhappy customer here. The seller should clearly specify that the basic iPad size that launched the whole tablet market does not fit. That they were unable to add a friccin' 1/4" to their setup.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bisping

customer_reviews.title: Easy-to-setup - Natural Reading for Believable Speaking
customer_reviews.text: This teleprompter is perfect. I had my 17-year old set it up for me, though it wasn't laborious or time-consuming to go from box to ready-to-use. This is an inexpensive solution for a teleprompter, and the ease-of-use exceeded of my expectations. I thought the angle of the glass was extreme, and I worried that I couldn't view it and read naturally, and yet, that company knows what they are doing. The positioning gave me perfect viewing and natural reading. I downloaded the Teleprompter +3 app on my iPad and iPhone, and I controlled the teleprompter using my phone as a remote.
customer_reviews.author: MGM

customer_reviews.title: Blurry image
customer_reviews.text: Update: I contacted Glide Gear, and they were kind enough to send a replacement glass which fixed the problem entirely. I'm very grateful and the Teleprompter works great, the image could be a little bit brighter, however the text is very readable and clear. Thanks again for your wonderful customer support. I'm extremly satisfied. Old Review: Everything works except the glass itself, it doubles the image with any screen you put on. The very purpose of this teleprompter is defeated by a poor quality glass that impairs your ability to read. Be warned.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Meono

customer_reviews.title: Best iPad teleprompter
customer_reviews.text: Great alternative to an expensive teleprompter. I'll save you some trouble and tell you what else to get - the Teleprompt+3 app and the Satechi Wireless Multimedia & Presenter Remote. I got one on Amazon for about $40 and it is a must if you plan to read teleprompter scripts longer than 30 seconds or so.
customer_reviews.author: Ross G.

customer_reviews.title: Will not work with manfrotto tripods
customer_reviews.text: This is constructed in a way that the front bolts on the teleprompter will not allow it to slide on a manfrotto tripod with a long plate. It is designed for a tripod that doesn't have the plate slide on.
customer_reviews.author: El_Handsome

customer_reviews.title: Functional and Inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: This functions pretty well, and I've used it several times now. It's a game changer to have a teleprompter, I use it for nearly all of my videos. A few things to note with this one... The construction is not optimal, some of the holes are misaligned and it's hard to keep the prompter at the correct angle. The fabric smelt of cigarette smoke when I received it and sometimes falls in front of the lens despite using the cord and the neck. It would be nice if the case had a cardboard insert between the fabric to make it more sturdy. Great value for the money and I'd recommend it for a budget teleprompter.
customer_reviews.author: M. Leitholt

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT FIT STANDARD IPAD
customer_reviews.text: It's 1/4" too short. Product description says it fits up to 7.5 x 10.5 inches .. it doesn't. It fits 7 inches ... a standard iPad is JUST over 7 inches, and does not fit this teleprompter. Completely unusable by me.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Hatton

customer_reviews.title: Works great! I dont always need a teleprompter for video ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I dont always need a teleprompter for video work but when someone gets stuck on a line it saves the day every time. Why loose time and money on your shoots because the on camera talent cant remember their line? Get a teleprompter rig and save time and money on your shoot and in the editing room.
customer_reviews.author: 60 Cycle Hum

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit claimed dimensions
customer_reviews.text: Product description says "Accommodates any smartphone or tablet up to 10.5 x 7.5 Inches". This is not accurate. The brace opening is 11" wide, but curved corners on the bottom of the brace make it only 10" wide between the curves. Screens or devices that can fit in the brace if held up above the sliding clamp, don't fit in the brace when positioned correctly, resting on the sliding clamp. That said, the glass / mirror is great, clarity of reflection and video through glass is great, hood is okay (drawstring awkward), and screws/mounts slightly chintzy.
customer_reviews.author: Terretta

customer_reviews.title: Excellent alternative -
customer_reviews.text: I modified the holding bracket to allow mounting the iPad from the front by loosing the two screws on the end slider, and slipping the iPad in and locking it down ... but overall I love the unit. I'm using the Prompter Pal app, (it rocks for the money), a 9" field monitor for the operator, and a Bluetooth keyboard. I use it in a stand alone capacity sitting in front of a camera on a tripod... This setup makes it a lot more flexible and safe especially if your using a full size camera, i.e. the Sony F7.
customer_reviews.author: R. Raney

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but issues so far on this Teleprompter unit
customer_reviews.text: Of all the cameras and camcorders only our Sony Rx100 V would work somewhat. The enclosed hood is more of a pain then it’s worth at times and often Still bunches up under the lense. I had high hopes for this. Also to note my hood is missing some Velcro along the side which could be part of the issue alongside with a slider lock screw being too short it doesn’t lock into place sturdy. Cameras tested Sony rx100 m V Cannon vixia hf g40 Black magic ursa mini 4K Panasonic lumix dc gh5
customer_reviews.author: Munchnplay

customer_reviews.title: What a failure for a product
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. First, yes, the material is good- (black overlay bag and a piece of glass and metal structure) But everything else and the technology- poorly constructed. Pic #1- need duct tape to stabilize overlay Pic #2 – sinch-string button not stable, bag does not fit Pic #3 - shows the overlay bag creeping into the shot when there is no duct tape stabilizing it Pic #4 – the shotty read with light reflecting your read. Disappointed and frustrated that someone could deliver such a non-working POS. But here's the deal, I got this piece of vlogging equipment from a youtube influencer referral
customer_reviews.author: BeanBrain

customer_reviews.title: Tank-Like, High Value Teleprompter for Prosumer Video Creators
customer_reviews.text: Breakthrough pricing for this prosumer-class of a teleprompter! The slide could accommodate slightly larger tablet and camera hood could possibly be rigged with an external shell/cage to prevent the cloth from dropping but these are the only two negatives from this new teleprompter. As far as my research informs me, nothing else comes close to this quality and functionality at this price. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Berry

customer_reviews.title: Works really well.
customer_reviews.text: I think this is the best buy in its price range. Several other versions are awkward and flimsy to use. This is a well put together unit. The beamsplitter glass works well and in 4k the image degradation is minimal. If you need an easy to use and affordable teleprompter, try this one. My only complaint is that if you aren't paying attention when collapsing the teleprompter you might drop the glass portion onto the metal cradle that holds the iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Built sturdy, excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: The TMP 100 is very well built. We use it to tape video classes and it works well with our iPad and teleprompter software. The glass seems to be very high quality. Sturdy. The cape has a drawstring that hugs the lens. No problems with the unit. I did have an issue that Customer Service corrected immediately: my camera sits very low on the slide tray, so when reading the script on the prompter, my wife's eyes focused slightly above the center of the lens. Customer Service immediately sent me an attachment to the mount screw that raised the body about a half inch, which was just right.
customer_reviews.author: kwhit

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I do some video script work, but not that consistently, so I couldn't even consider some of the more expensive offerings. Rental was my only really option, but for 7 days of rental I was able to afford this unit. Arrived in great shape, and was easy to setup and use. It ran flawlessly with both my Sony A7M3 and A6400. Seems solid, and built to last (at least for the moderate use that I'll be requiring).
customer_reviews.author: T.C.Zee

customer_reviews.title: You Don't Have to Drop Thousands of Dollars for a Good Teleprompter
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of talking in front of a camera; for my church and my youtube channel. Memorizing a script is rarely an option and holding a script in my hand doesn't work, either. So I was very glad to find this product! It works great! Although the slot for a tablet is a little small, I think that's just because I'm using an old iPad. The glass is nice and clear. It reflects the words perfectly, and you don't see a hint of them in the camera. A fantastic buy!
customer_reviews.author: Ian K Maphet

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, works as intended
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I didn't give it a 5 is that we weren't 100% clear on how it should be set and the manual doesn't get into much details. Maybe they were trying to keep the manual simple too, but there was a screw that was loose and we weren't sure how it should be. We figured it out, but we lost about 15 minutes on a set doing that. That's the only reason for a 4.
customer_reviews.author: debo7debo

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with the build, quality materials, packaging and end-result. Support is excellent with many FAQ's available and quick response to email. Only small drawback is fabric hood sometimes came into frame, should have a design to be able to pull the material back externally if possible (drawstring maybe?), otherwise worked as very well and got the job done. Price was very good as well.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic TelePrompter for beginning professional work.
customer_reviews.text: Really good teleprompter setup. Excellent for the price. Yes, you can pay more for better quality and more features, but this was a great buy. We already have an Android tablet, so all I had to do is buy an app and a wireless remote. Side note, when you buy a remote, find one that doesn't have clicky buttons. Ours clicks kinda loud, and it can be picked up by the microphones.
customer_reviews.author: ironorr84

customer_reviews.title: Great but there are tricks to know.
customer_reviews.text: This teleprompter is nice. But at times it is a little annoying to set up. It does add some greens to the imagine and maybe takes about a 1/2 stop of brightness down. You will probably need to make color corrections just for this teleprompter and save it like a setting. It’s really nice with an iPad but almost impossible to read with an iPhone unless you are 3 -5 feet away.
customer_reviews.author: James Patton

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: Manufacturing defect , we almost 10 people tried to assemble it, it is impossible to fit beam splitter glass on to the frame , I could not return it because I left it in India and I cannot get it back until June this year[ 2019] .
customer_reviews.author: Rav

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Teleprompter but may need adjustments for larger cameras
customer_reviews.text: It's a great deal and a value compared to others but does require some adjustments for lager Cinema cameras. I'm sure it's just find for DSLR and smaller cameras but for larger cameras like Canon Cinema, RED, Etc. it requires some adjustments. The cloth that blocks light is a bit problematic and needs to be clamped to avoid vignetting but again that's on a large cinema camera.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Black-out material *very* difficult to work with
customer_reviews.text: Good size and the reflection is perfect. The material that is used however is a heavy canvas. That probably sounds like a good thing - it’s not. Due to the heavy weight of the material the blackout material is constantly having to be moved out of frame so the camera isn’t picking it up. I wouldn’t buy this product again and I don’t recommend that anyone that wants a trouble-free teleprompter buy it either.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Lewandowski

customer_reviews.title: Great for longer lenses
customer_reviews.text: Great teleprompter stand. Easy to set up and add iPad into. The frame itself is weighted and sturdy. The one problem I had with the hood was trying to get it set over shorter camera lenses so that it didn’t obstruct any of the view. It took a bit of straightening of the hood. If you use longer lenses you should be fine. Overall super satisfied and it’s just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C.

customer_reviews.title: Well built, great price, production game changer for us.
customer_reviews.text: The Glide Gear has repeatedly exceeded all expectations. We use it with an iPad Pro 10.5", and it has completely changed our weekly news show. Our shooting time went from 1.5 hours to about 20mins. The quality of our production is SO much higher because of this tool. The case is excellent. It would be nice if we could adjust the angle of the reflecting glass, but it's not a deal breaker at this point. Easily recommend this to anyone with a lot of dialog in their videos.
customer_reviews.author: Coptool

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy unless you’re needs are very basic
customer_reviews.text: This product isn’t anything special and I don’t know why it’s the number one recommended product on Amazon. It doesn’t fit an iPad Pro, which it really easily could with a minor adjustment on construction. Even a micro iPad, the area it sits in is not low enough to keep it out of the way of the camera view without a ton of camera adjustments. The glass doesn’t adjust like other models.l for the angle so you have much less customization. Upgrade to the $280 iPad Pro version. I missed the return window on this (my fault). Got ahead of production to have ready when needed based off the rating and amazon push for the product. Super disappointed for $200.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Great Gear for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: The device works very well with our existing equipment as delivered. However, we use a standard mounting system across all of our cameras and tripods/support devices, so we retrofitted with a mounting base and a receiving base for enhanced ease of use, so that setups and breakdown are super quick and easy. We use a 8" Fire tablet for our script. It fits well and is easy to read at about 6 feet. Great piece of gear for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Bill W.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Teleprompter! Can not be beat for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Great product that works just as you would expect, if not much better. You can not beat this teleprompter! for under $200. Very sturdy, well made and comes with a great case. I would highly recommend this teleprompter to anyone looking to save big bucks and get the performance and build quality of a prompter costing many hundreds of dollars more! 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny M

customer_reviews.title: Definitely works well with an iPad, but is a little bit wonky to set up
customer_reviews.text: It’s alright, but really, it takes some time getting things set up just right and then theres the fact that you need an app (logically). It just takes a little more time and effort to set up than I had hoped, and I also needed to use a spacer which most people won’t have readily in order to make it work with my tripod.
customer_reviews.author: CB Adams

customer_reviews.title: Poor design.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this and I can make it function, but the angle of the mirror/glass is not adjustable. There are a couple of settings, but they are not where I need them. You'd think that would be a high priority for the designers. I'll be buying a different one from a different company.
customer_reviews.author: barkingcows

customer_reviews.title: Should have DIY'd this one.
customer_reviews.text: I should have just built my own or bought one built on a rail system. This is cheap. I could've DIY'd this for about $30 and put it on a rail system for about $30 more. I had to drill a hole in the pad just to add another set screw. I'm not putting my $4,000 rig on something flimsy like this with just one cheap screw.
customer_reviews.author: John J

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, Save Your Money. Does Not Stay Up.
customer_reviews.text: I NEVER write Amazon reviews, despite being a frequent Amazon shopper. However, this product is absolutely terrible and not worth your $200. Besides the fact that the device is entirely too heavy and had to be propped up using books, the glass shattered and the black-out cover started tearing at the seams (see the photos). Please do NOT waste your money on this teleprompter.
customer_reviews.author: Review Name

customer_reviews.title: Works great w/my cannon - dropped it 2x, finally broke glass
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how well this works - it is very sturdy. I have a home setup and my kids and dogs managed to push the tripod over 2x. The 2nd time the glass shattered - i'm not going to try to order a replacement piece of glass because I can't imagine a better prompter. I just left them a voice mail message.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Dana

customer_reviews.title: In use in less than 20 minutes
customer_reviews.text: So HAPPY to purchase a tool that works out of the box and truly professional / commercial quality. My camera is a little short, but the email address provided, responded in less than an hour. RESOLVED. Several other great videos are attached to other reviews, just one convinced me about the functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Magnant

customer_reviews.title: A reasonably priced device that allows you to create professional video presentations
customer_reviews.text: The device is easy to set up and as a handy carrying case all for a reasonable price. The teleprompter is being used to create short videos for business presentations. Since this is our first attempt to expand our ability to communicate with our clients and so we will be creating many videos to be distributed to these clients.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas E. Nugent

customer_reviews.title: Great tool to have for clients
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a great tool to add to the "camera bag." There are a couple things I would "upgrade." 1. I had to add a cheese plate between the teleprompter and my tripod mounting plate because there are very large screw heads protruding from the bottom of prompter, so without the added height it wouldn't slide onto the tripod. 2. Add a second screw to the camera mounting platform. With just one screw the camera can slowly spin (used and FS5), out of place as you take it on and off the tripod. Again, this wouldn't stop me from buying it again, just little details that would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Photog9

customer_reviews.title: incorrect cover that ruins its use
customer_reviews.text: unlike the cover depicted for this product, mine came with an extra long one that gets in the way of the shot. I had to cut the bottom of it with a knife. There's no reason for the cloth to include that bottom portion. It was a huge hassle, and I'm angry I spent so much on this when I could've just gotten that Parrot one for half the price
customer_reviews.author: The Cynical Historian

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, works well, nice case
customer_reviews.text: We frequently shoot videos at work for training and communication, and this inexpensive teleprompter works well for us. We're not professional videographers. This is easy for us to assemble, it feels sturdy enough, and the carrying case works well. Worthwhile purchase for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: S. Berg

customer_reviews.title: Now it works great. No double images on the glass
customer_reviews.text: I initially received a defective product. There were two reflected images on the glass, which made really hard to read. But Glide Gear was kind enough to send me a replacement piece of glass. Now it works great. No double images on the glass.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, affordable teleprompter
customer_reviews.text: Great unit - easily portable in the included case - I've used it on several shoots now since I bought it. One trick is if your camera is tilted down at all that can make the iPad roll the text upside down if it's slanted down - I wind up setting the bottom of the iPad on top of the notched mount that it's supposed to go into and that keeps it more level. Otherwise if you're shooting straight on with someone it works great.
customer_reviews.author: mikev

customer_reviews.title: Much easier than I would have imagined!
customer_reviews.text: When my wife suggested I buy a teleprompter to help with video sales production, I was initially intimidated by the idea. I went ahead with it anyways but very reluctantly. This ended up being a great idea and it works so easily. Even a caveman could do it! I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Speed Zone 26

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to my productions!
customer_reviews.text: The GlideGear Teleprompter works great and has everything I needed to work for my Canon Cinema EOS Camera. I was concerned that there were no images of this with larger cameras but it seems fine. I am very happy that I don’t need to source a lens drape like other devices listed on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: G RobertBTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: One of the best teleprompters on the market
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed with the simplicity of setting up the teleprompter and the step by step instructions. This is a very sturdy teleprompter and the carrying case is just as sturdy. I was able to setup with my ipad in about 10 minutes the first time and I was reading the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: E MICHAEL

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Build, Easy to Use.
customer_reviews.text: I do Videography for a lot of business clients and the hardest part of the production is getting talent to memorize scripts. Script and speech memorization takes tons of practice perfecting, and not everyone has the time or ability to do so. This product is one of the best investments I've made for film making. I was looking into cheap DIY teleprompters, but the build quality of the TMP100 is far superior. I would say that with the production and editing time saved (as projects shot with this in the workflow get done 3 times faster) this thing pays for itself after about three shoots.
customer_reviews.author: Induction Studios

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back in June of 2019. After just a few weeks of usage, the black lens cover ripped along the seam. As time has gone on it's completely ripped open now. I am now trying to find a way to fix it or replace it. It's also a little difficult to get the nuts loosened to slide the bracket out for whatever tablet device you're using. The space is just tight for someone with bigger hands. The overall rail is nice and the camera sits on it nicely. And it's nice that it's compact and easily stored. I just wish the design could be a little different for the tablet slide as well as the lens cover.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Killman

customer_reviews.title: pretty good overall
customer_reviews.text: I had a little bit of trouble with setting it up and figuring out the pieces. but once i did, it worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Sevan

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Love this teleprompter. Use it for my youtube channel "Justin_tech" and it's been doing me well. Buy it nice or buy it twice I always say. It's worth the investment, comes with a nice carrying bag, and is extremely easy to use. Make sure you balance it out well on your tripod. My tripod was tilting down at first once I put my ipad on - close call. Enjoy this one!
customer_reviews.author: Justin_tech

customer_reviews.title: Dies NOT WORK WITH IPAD PRO 12.9!!
customer_reviews.text: Despite what it says “works with any tablet,” the apparatus DOES NOT FIT THE IPAD 12.9. The iPad is too wide to fit between the metal brackets that hold it in place. If you have an iPad Pro 12 do not get this !! No I’m stop using an iPad mini.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Malito

customer_reviews.title: Better than what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Having used professional teleprompters for work in the past, I have spent hours in front of the camera "reading the words." I am starting a home project with a filming component, and this teleprompter works perfectly for that. I like the packaging, the setup is easy enough, and I think this will be a useful part of my home video production process.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and woked well out of the box
customer_reviews.text: This seems like it will be a great teleprompter. It was easy to set up and we were able to use it within minutes. The only issue was the little drawstring cover that seemed on the small size and gave us some frustration. Overall, we're very please with it.
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: Good Improvement on earlier model
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Teleprompter from this company. The earlier version had difficulty adjusting the glass angle. This has a much more intuitive bracket which allows for more angle possibilities. This is the best value teleprompter I have found, absolutely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: What a great delivery and packaging. I get really worried when handling teleprompters because of the glass, but this one makes it easy to handle. The image is clear. To my delight, it fits my larger video camcorder and all is very cool.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Hague

customer_reviews.title: Get the Caddie Buddy!
customer_reviews.text: This isn't so much a review as it is a strong recommendation. If the Caddie Buddy didn't exist, I would recommend this teleprompter with 4 stars. But the Caddie Buddy does exist. It's about 40 dollars less expensive, it fixes several annoying problems with the Glide Gear, it comes with more accessories and more features. Get the Caddie Buddy. It's a no-brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Campanaro

customer_reviews.title: Actual teleprompter works great, but...
customer_reviews.text: Actual teleprompter works great, but it's a hassle to use for my BMPCC4K and tripod/monopod setup and adjusting the teleprompter angle is not easy. I just keep the teleprompter in the angle I like and don't put it in the case.
customer_reviews.author: eric yun

customer_reviews.title: Should work fine for anyone looking for a simple teleprompter set up
customer_reviews.text: >Works really well with my tablet for reading scripts. >The 2 pins on the side meant to keep the hood in place are a little tough to screw in.
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Teleprompter
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for a few shoots not and it has saved me many hours over the more janky solutions I have tried and the quality of the end result is sooo much better. Did a shoot last night and we were done in 30 min. Set up and breakdown took 2 hours. If we had been using cards or taped scripts (as I've done in the past) it would have taken longer and looked like rap as the talent's eye's moved off camera. Worth twice the price this is.
customer_reviews.author: W. nobes

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy it again but it ain’t perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned lots of prompter rugs from 19 inch down to this. The unit is very good. It travels really well. Don’t throw the travel box away. It’s kind of critical to avoid glass breaking. I now pull my glass and put into a separate case by pelican. It doesn’t tip up to high enough angle so we added some shims and it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: MattTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Very Professional, Robust and Badass.
customer_reviews.text: The Teleprompter is very robust, it is a little heavy for a normal tripod, so I had to buy a new Dolica tripod, cuz other normal tripod wouldn't hold the weight and just fell, so keep that in mind. It is a very good cloth on the back and it is adjustable. Easy to carry with the protective bag. I started using it with an App called Simple Teleprompter and a 10.1 inches Tablet. They work perfect with this and the job gets done perfectly as well. I am very satisfied with the product. If you need a TP, get this one, it doesn't ask anything of the most expensive ones and it really does the job very well.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Teleprompter, especially for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This teleprompter is well built and functions as advertised. Along with the Teleprompter Premium app, it works "like a charm". I do principally documentaries and I look forward to using it for my Intro and "Outro" commentaries on my film which is currently in post. The only criticism I have is that the adhesive for the velcro strips that hold the cloth shield around the mirror comes off the "base" rather easily. I just have to be careful when removing the shield! All in all, a great find!
customer_reviews.author: John Glassco

customer_reviews.title: Even I Could Use It!!!
customer_reviews.text: As someone new to creating my own videos, I was finding it a challenge to get all my words out consistently...too many takes, etc. This product has changed that! I use it with the PromptSmart app and viola!!!! No more paper and note cards taped up all over the room. It was easy to unbox and set up, too. I keep a quick release attached to it so I can pop it off and on easily. I also like the carrying case which will make it easy to transport when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: So much easier to make videos
customer_reviews.text: I'm stating a cooking channel on YouTube, and this turned out to be a life saver. No more having to memorize entire scripts. Now they are right in front of me as I am presenting. Large enough to see from across the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Mr So 'n So

customer_reviews.title: GAME CHANGER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I tried to do videos (myself and of others) before this... If I had only known how easy this makes it I would have gotten one years ago! This one does a great job and doesn't distort the image at all.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Overall great value for a sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: I first got into videography with my smartphone. I learned that there was a whole branch of equipment specifically one can use for iphone videography. I in turn found glide gear. Loved the build of it so years later, when I find this teleprompter, I knew it would be a good buy. It is a great product and I stand by it. Only one problem: the metal frame was just fractions of a centimeter off, so when it goes into its 45 degree angle, its kind of hard to screw it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Norbi forero

customer_reviews.title: Up and running in a few minutes
customer_reviews.text: Only took a couple minutes to get this set up with my mirrorless camera and tripod. While I don't need to move it outside the studio much, it comes in a nice little carrying bag that makes it simple to do that if you need. As this is my first teleprompter, I was concerned that using my smartphone would be too difficult. I thought I might need a tablet instead. But, after testing it out with my phone I think it'll work great! Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: It works and works well...
customer_reviews.text: The product is sturdy and well made. My only complaint is that I needed to change tripods because the one I started with wasn't beefy enough...but then again, that underscores that this is not a poorly made product. If you're looking for a teleprompter that works and works well...this should be your teleprompter.
customer_reviews.author: NCBSC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product at a Very Reasonable Price
customer_reviews.text: I just received my Glide Gear TMP 100, set it up right away, and gave it a test run. I am very impressed. The quality of the construction is very sturdy, it is very well designed, and it's incredibly easy to set up. It does exactly what I need it to do. And it folds up and stores away quickly and easily in the included carrying case. I am very impressed. It's going to help make my video productions much better. Thank you, Glide Gear!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Arkin

customer_reviews.title: Best value for the money in iPad prompters
customer_reviews.text: Good solid construction, well built carrying case, lightweight yet sturdy. Good quality glass, works well with most cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Neuman

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to use something to block the light.
customer_reviews.text: The beam splitting glass is magical, it works great with any iPad tablet or smart phone. You do have to block the light around the glass (like in the photo). They send a fairly nice fabric that is cut to shape to fit around your lens and the teleprompter glass; but it didn't work for our camera (Cannon C100) so we just throw some loose fabric over top; it's not pretty but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: works great & portable
customer_reviews.text: was pleasantly surprised with this. it comes fully assembled in the carry case, had it ready to go in no time. I've built my own before but the regular glass i used is only ok the coated glass this has makes the test much easier to read. the carrying case is a nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Well built and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Nice and compact product. Well built. Easy to pack and unpack for transportation in handy custom bag, No surprises. The camera connector screw could have been better. Wish the "Dark Room" fabric material was a bit more malleable in the back. Then again, the front needs to be sturdier so it will not sag and block the lens. I cut a long slit in the bottom of the cloth, along the middle of the track for camera, to prevent the material bulking up and blocking the lens.
customer_reviews.author: P Yal

customer_reviews.title: Turning Amazon in to the FBI for intrastate ad fraud!
customer_reviews.text: Item is fine. But Amazon ratings on my purchases are to warn you. They lie with splash ads for free debit card. Then rip you off. That’s fraud!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great easy to use product
customer_reviews.text: Great easy to use product, I wish the packing was done better as it arrived looking like a used unit but works great. My clients love that they don't have to memorize their interviews and can read straight into the camera.
customer_reviews.author: SamuelRiveraPhotography

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, high-quality, all metal
customer_reviews.text: I just received my Glide Gear TMP-100 teleprompter and couldn't be happier so far. There is virtually no plastic in its construction. It's an all metal frame, uses glass instead of plastic and has rubber pads. It's just excellent quality and extremely sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Lucero

customer_reviews.title: Why can't all companies be this awesome?
customer_reviews.text: For whatever reason the glass in my prompter seemed to be regular glass. The image was barely reflective and had a badly ghosted (doubled) image. I sent pics to Glide gear and they promptly replaced the whole glass assembly, frame and hood included. The new glass is beautiful and works exactly as it should. This company stands by their products and customers. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Brian A. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Teleprompter was bent
customer_reviews.text: The bracket that holds the mirror for the teleprompter was bent. Screws that are part of the system were out of place. One essential screw was at the bottom of the case. Assembly was required. Makes me wonder if this was not a product that was previously returned and sent to me.
customer_reviews.author: JMarcos

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The product looks good. I like it after I tested it the first time. However, my only concern is the black cloth that covers the camera is too rigid and rough. It is not smooth to handle. I found it difficult to cover the camera lens with the cloth. I had to do so much pulling on the cloth to get it out of the way of the camera lens.
customer_reviews.author: sevansiea

customer_reviews.title: Great teleprompter but keep in min your lens size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for 30mm mirrorless or probably 50ish mm full frame. Be aware of your lens size, but works great if using the right software.
customer_reviews.author: DC Clinton

customer_reviews.title: First time teleprompter user
customer_reviews.text: For the first time using a teleprompter it was pretty easy. Didn't have a tablet that fit the dimensions so I used my smart phone and it worked fine. Wasn't sure in the beginning if it was more then I needed, but after using it decided it was going to be very useful in the long run. I preferred it over both reading the teleprompter and filming straight on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t interfere with the image quality of the videos and it works from my iPhone all the way up to my iPad Pro. It has definitely improved the productiveness of the shoots and it’s improved the quality of the video too! Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.author: Judy Tobian

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and performance!
customer_reviews.text: This is very well-made and of excellent quality. I had to get a little creative to use it with my tiny Sony Handycam, but that's not surprising as this unit is obviously designed for more professional gear. I'm very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: S.S.

customer_reviews.title: Good Teleprompter - Travel Case So-So
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived well packaged and was relatively easy to set up. I tested with my tablet and it works great. I don't like the carry case. The foam inserts are flimsy will not hold up for the long term. Most of my recording is on-location. I may have to find another travel solution so the mirror won't break. I will be using it with a Canon AX20.
customer_reviews.author: PWE-Media

customer_reviews.title: Its good. Get it.
customer_reviews.text: This one is not available for prime and normally i dont buy anything that isnt prime but this one I did and im very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Teleprompter!
customer_reviews.text: This teleprompter is just amazing, I have always wanted to talk longer, but I always mess up. This fixes it -- it's like reading a script without anyone noticing. It's unquestionably a game changer for my channel on YouTube. Also, the price makes it even more attractive!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Bacopoulos

customer_reviews.title: Delivers as promised
customer_reviews.text: The Glide Gear TMP100 Adjustable iPad/ Tablet/ Smartphone Teleprompter Beam Splitter is a great tool. Right out of the box I was able to assemble it in less than 15 minutes. The construction is very sturdy. For the money, it is solidly built. It is the best I've used for my iPad Pro. This is a great tool to make your projects look more professional.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin J. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Great Teleprompter
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to get this unboxed and assembled. It was easy to set up with clear directions. It's very sturdy and easy to use. I'm using the Nano Teleprompter App with it and it's exactly what I expected and was looking for. The only downside I see to the TMP100 is the weight. It's a bit heavy by itself and a bit odd to balance on the tripod. For that reason I rated it 4 stars overall.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: So generic
customer_reviews.text: Don't wast your money on this product. Simply IPad doesn't fit. Totally useless.
customer_reviews.author: omar

customer_reviews.title: I wanted something simple, that was quick to set ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something simple, that was quick to set up. Also needed a product that I could use a phone or tablet for. Surprisingly it took me a while to find this teleprompter, and now that I've used it on multiple occasions I can say I made the right choice.
customer_reviews.author: Keiththe3rd

customer_reviews.title: Least delicate teleprompter I've ever seen.
customer_reviews.text: Aside from the glass itself, this thing's construction is metal in all but the most minor of places, and is incredibly sturdy. The glass itself came as one would expect, and consumers must be wary of it's fragility- though all glass suffers from this problem. The true marvel of this product comes from the carrying bag- my advice is to leave the foam inserts in for transportation- my newest gear has just become my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: brooke

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and store
customer_reviews.text: Great teleprompter that comes with a nice case to easily store or transport it. A great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: CptDecker

customer_reviews.title: Great teleprompter for YouTubers
customer_reviews.text: Takes minutes to set-up, comes with a case for travel, and does everything I'd need. I run the Parrot Teleprompter app, which mirrors text (required for any reflective teleprompter).
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Rigger

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: So happy with it!! No need to spend $500 plus. This is the device that will do the job!
customer_reviews.author: David E. Smith Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t think about it grab it.
customer_reviews.text: Client definitely took me and the team much more seriously once we pulled this out.
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: Wanted It To Work
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a great product. Just wasn’t compatible with my setup.
customer_reviews.author: pisceankarma

customer_reviews.title: This works great for my live show
customer_reviews.text: I love this inexpensive teleprompter. It works well with my smartphone. I enjoy using it for my podcast for intro and questions or an outline. This is amazing for practically anything virtual. I love using it for making instructional workout videos too.
customer_reviews.author: linda mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Making video's like the pro's!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very hesitant to buy a teleprompter for fear of complications and longevity. This was the exact opposite! The teleprompter is built with quality material but lightweight as well. It comes assembled out of the box and ready to use. I recommend this to all who are looking to get a high-quality teleprompter on a budget!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: High quality product, very clear to read in front of camera even with high luminous light!
customer_reviews.author: Victor.C

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great value teleprompter. Would be better with easier attachment of phone or tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome unit for your video arsenal
customer_reviews.text: This rig works great. It's easy to assemble and made my videos come out more professional. I can't wait to record more just to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Max and Oliver

product_meta.title: Glide Gear TMP100 Adjustable iPad/ Tablet/ Smartphone Teleprompter Beam Splitter 70/30 Glass w/ Carry Case No Plastic All Metal / No Assembly Required
feature_bullets: Designed to shoot with DSLR/ Mirrorless Cameras. Prompting use with Android and IOS Teleprompter apps / Accommodates any smartphone or tablet up to 10.5 x 7.5 Inches
Industry standard beam split glass with 70/30 visible light transmission.
No assembly required / Collapsible teleprompter for small footprint and easy transport / Tripod and Camera NOT included
Your camera will not photograph the text in the video. We recommend using the App Teleprompter Premium/ Pro with your tablet or smartphone
Protective Carry Case Included. 10 feet reading range

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars506 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
